Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipFitSlotBookingInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitSlotBookingService
public interface FlipFitSlotBookingInterface
Interface for managing slot bookings in the FlipFit system. Provides methods for booking, listing, and canceling slot bookings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    bookSlot(String userId, LocalDate bookingDate, FlipFitCenterSlot slot, String paymentId)
    Books a slot for a user on a specified date.
    void
    cancelBooking(String bookingId)
    Cancels a specific booking.
    List<FlipFitSlotBooking>
    listBookings(String userId)
    Retrieves a list of bookings made by a user.

  • Method Details

    • bookSlot

      void bookSlot(String userId, LocalDate bookingDate, FlipFitCenterSlot slot, String paymentId) throws GymSlotSeatLimitReachedException, InvalidSlotException
      Books a slot for a user on a specified date.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user making the booking
      bookingDate - the date on which the booking is made
      slot - the slot to be booked
      paymentId - the ID of the payment associated with the booking
      Throws:
      GymSlotSeatLimitReachedException - if the slot has reached its seat limit
      InvalidSlotException - if the provided slot is invalid

    • listBookings

      List<FlipFitSlotBooking> listBookings(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of bookings made by a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose bookings are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of FlipFitSlotBooking objects representing the user's bookings

    • cancelBooking

      void cancelBooking(String bookingId) throws InvalidBookingException
      Cancels a specific booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - the ID of the booking to be canceled
      Throws:
      InvalidBookingException - if the booking ID is invalid or the booking cannot be canceled
